item.title: Delete volume using point with VEX
item.author: Author
item.description: Delete volume using point with VEX volume wrangle: 1 2 3 4 5 6 int pt = nearpoint(1,@P); vector P = point(1,'P',pt); float radius = chf('radius'); float del = chramp('falloff',fit(distance(@P,P),chf('min'),radius,0,1)); @density*=del; @temperature*=del;
